item.title: Trump nominates Jared Isaacman, private astronaut and Shift4 CEO, for NASA chief
item.description: President-elect Donald Trump on Wednesday nominated Jared Isaacman to be NASA Administrator.

item.title: ESPN hopes to reach more casual sports fans with Disney+ integration
item.description: Disney debuted an ESPN tab on Disney+ on Wednesday for ESPN+ subscribers and will make about 100 live games available on Disney+ to nonsubscribers.

item.title: OpenAI's active user count soars to 300 million people per week
item.description: After months of C-suite changes, tender offers and a soaring valuation, OpenAI has reached a new milestone: 300 million weekly active users.

item.title: GM expects more than $5 billion impact from China restructuring, including plant closures
item.description: General Motors expects a restructuring of its joint venture operations with SAIC Motor in China to cost more than $5 billion in noncash charges and wr...

item.title: Airline executives defend seat fees before Senate panel
item.description: Executives from American, United, Delta, Frontier and Spirit are set to testify before a Senate panel Wednesday about their seating fees.
